Package MainGameLogic

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
MainGameLogic.Ship
public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
This class implements a Ship which is used for traveling between Islands and stores the current goods and upgrades the player has brought.
Version:
1.2, 16 April 2021.
Author:
Ryan Boyd, John Elliott

    Initializes a Ship object.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship​(java.lang.String shipName, int crewNum, double capacity, double speed, java.util.ArrayList<Upgrade> allUpgrades)
      Initializes a Ship object.
      Parameters:
      shipName - Name of the Ship.
      crewNum - Number of crew on-board.
      capacity - The capacity to hold items and upgrades.
      speed - The Speed of the Ship.
      allUpgrades - All the upgrades on the ship.

  • Method Details

    • getWagesToPay

      public int getWagesToPay​(int duration)
      A get method that returns the total wages cost.
      Parameters:
      duration - The length of time to sail.
      Returns:
      wageTotal Cost of all the wages.

    • getCargoSize

      public double getCargoSize()
      A get method that returns the total cargo size.
      Returns:
      cargoCapacity The cargo size of the ship.

    • findCargoLeft

      public double findCargoLeft()
      Determines the size of the cargo left.
      Returns:
      cargoLeft The cargo size remaining on the ship.

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(Item newitem)
      Add an item to the ships cargo.
      Parameters:
      newitem - The item to be added to the ship cargo.

    • canPayWages

      public boolean canPayWages​(int currentFunds, int duration)
      Returns a boolean that is true if the player can pay the wages for a given trip.
      Parameters:
      currentFunds - The current wealth of the player.
      duration - The duration of the planned travel.
      Returns:
      canPay Expresses if the player can pay the cost.

    • repairDamage

      public int repairDamage()
      Fixes the Ship and returns damageStatus to 0. Then returns the cost of fixing the damage.
      Returns:
      repairTotal Cost of total repair.

    • canRepair

      public boolean canRepair​(int currentFunds)
      Returns a boolean that is true if the player can pay the cost of the repairs needed.
      Parameters:
      currentFunds - The current wealth of the player.
      Returns:
      canPay Expresses if the player can pay the cost.

    • isDamaged

      public boolean isDamaged()
      Returns a boolean that is true if the Ship is currently damaged.
      Returns:
      isDamaged Expresses if the Ship is currently damaged.

    • getSpeed

      public double getSpeed()
      Determines the speed the ship is currently going at.
      Returns:
      sailSpeed The speed of the Ship.

    • getCargo

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getCargo()
      A get method for returning the item currently in the cargo.
      Returns:
      itemsInCargo The items in the ship cargo.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the string representation of the ship currently being used.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      shipInfo Information about the ship.

    • getAllCargoString

      public java.lang.String getAllCargoString()
      Returns information of all the current cargo in the ship. Both sold and not sold.
      Returns:
      cargo Information about all the players cargo.

    • getItemWithinCargo

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getItemWithinCargo()
      A get method that returns the items current in the cargo.
      Returns:
      itemsInCargo A list of items in the cargo.

    • itemSold

      public void itemSold​(int itemIndex)
      Sells an item in the ships cargo. Adds it to the itemsSold list.
      Parameters:
      itemIndex - The index of the item to remove from the cargo.

    • getUpgrade

      public Upgrade getUpgrade​(java.lang.String type)
      A get method that finds a ships upgrade of a given type and returns that.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of ship upgrade being searched for.
      Returns:
      upgrade The Upgrade that matches the type.

    • getCargoValue

      public int getCargoValue()
      Returns the value of all items currently in the ships cargo.
      Returns:
      value The value of all items in the cargo.

    • stealCargo

      public void stealCargo()
      During the pirate event if lost this method is used to "steal" all the players cargo without giving them any increases in their wealth.

    • addDamage

      public void addDamage​(int damage)
      Add damage to the ship.
      Parameters:
      damage - The damage to be added to the ship.
